Package ru.perm.kefir.bbcode

Interface Summary
PatternElement Pattern element for parse part of bbcode
TemplateElement The element of template to build target text
TextProcessor The interface of text processors
TextProcessorFactory The TextProcessor factory interface
 

Class Summary
AbstractCode Abstract bb-code
BBProcessorFactory Factory for creating BBProcessor from Stream, File, Resource with configuration or default bb-processor.
Code The bbcode class
Configuration Configuration of bbcode processor.
ConfigurationFactory Create the text processor configuration
Constant Constant element of pattern or template
ConstantCode Code with constant string pattern.
Context The bb-processing context
EscapeProcessor Class for escape processing.
EscapeXmlProcessorFactory The class for creating the escape xml special symbols processor.
NamedElement Named element are variable and text PatternElement or TemplateElement
NamedValue Named value to build target text
Pattern Represents the pattern
Scope bb-code scope.
Source Класс источник для парсинга BB-кодов
Template Code template
Text Класс текста, который подлежит парсингу
TextProcessorAdapter Text Processor adapter implement methods for String, StringBuffer, StringBuilder
TextProcessorChain Chain of text processors wich process text serially
Variable Класс переменной
 

Exception Summary
TextProcessorFactoryException Exception if TextProcessorFactory can't create the TextProcessor instance
